This simulation geometry file has the correct Z0 gap for PC2 and PC3 (May 13,2002)
The Z0 gap at PC2 and PC3 was changed from 8.104 to 11.4
The pixel spacing at PC2 and PC3 was changed from 0.025 to 0.05
The PC2 Z extent has been changed from 152.475 to 157.035
The PC2 pixel length has been changed from 1.3755 to 1.387
The PC2 anode spacing has been changed from 1.3613 to 1.362
The PC3 Z extent has been changed from 178.69 to 183.03.
The PC3 pixel length has been changed from 1.622 to 1.623
The PC3 anode spacing has been changed from 1.60 to 1.598
